name: markdown-list-table-toggler
description: Toggle Markdown list blocks and table blocks with context-aware conversion.

markdownListTableToggler.rootHeaderName.description: Header name for the first (root) column.

markdownListTableToggler.outputEmptyKeys.description: Output keys for empty table cells during table-to-list conversion.

markdownListTableToggler.valueEscapeStyl.description: Value quoting strategy during table-to-list conversion.

markdownListTableToggler.listMarkerStyle.description: List marker style during table-to-list conversion.

markdownListTableToggler.formatTable.description: Align table column widths during list-to-table conversion.

markdownListTableToggler.smartPipeEscape.description: Avoid escaping pipes inside code spans or code fences.

markdownListTableToggler.flattenNestedKe.description: Flatten nested list keys using dot notation during list-to-table conversion.
